TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyGroupDescription extends System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription

summary.span: 描述使用屬性名稱作為準則的項目群組。

span.span: Describes the grouping of items using a property name as the criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視支援分組，可讓使用者能夠為邏輯群組的 [集合] 檢視中的集合分割的功能。Views support the functionality of grouping, which allows the user to partition the collection in the collection view into logical groups. 群組可以是明確的，由使用者提供群組清單，或者是隱含的，讓群組依據資料動態產生。The groups can be explicit, where the user supplies a list of groups, or implicit, where the groups are generated dynamically depending on the data. 可讓您建立為基礎的隱含群組。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果您只想要依屬性分組您可以設定屬性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果您想要變更值，最後用於的群組，您可以使用屬性，來提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要根據名稱的第一個字母的群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果屬性未設定，項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 您也可以定義如何比較字串應該採取的地方使用屬性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example shows how to use this constructor. summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至屬性值或項目的轉換器，以產生用來決定項目所屬群組的最終值。

span.span: Gets or sets a converter to apply to the property value or the item to produce the final value that is used to determine which group(s) an item belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要變更值，最後用於的群組，您可以使用屬性，來提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要根據名稱的第一個字母的群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果屬性未設定，項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您建立為基礎的隱含群組。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果您只想要依屬性分組您可以設定屬性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果您想要變更值，最後用於的群組，您可以使用屬性，來提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要根據名稱的第一個字母的群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果屬性未設定，項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 您也可以定義如何比較字串應該採取的地方使用屬性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在比較這兩個值都是字串，否則，會忽略這項目。This is ignored unless both values in the comparison are strings.
